description: Table by antidiagonals of rows of sequences where each row is binomial transform of preceding row and row 1 is (1,2,1,2,1,2,1,2,...).
formula: T(n, k) =(3n^k-(n-2)^k)/2. Coefficient of x^k in expansion of (1-(n-3)x)/((1-nx)(1-(n-2)x)).
crossrefs: Rows include A011782 (but signed), A000034, A003945, A003462, A010036. Columns include A000012, A000027, A028872.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 05 2001
